comments.author: Dave
comments.body: When Steve told me iSean and Kevin would be joining us, I said that that was halfway to good news... sort of like the time the plumber fixed our leaky shower, but started a fire in the basement that char-broiled Uncle Ernie. But as it turned out, iSean's company was surprisingly pleasant... what little we had of it. He blasted off the front of the pack like a Saturn IV rocket, and we spent most of the ride chasing the WalMart price tag that fluttered annoyingly at us from his seat post. Dude's been training. By the way, I love tropes. My dear old Okie Grandma, rest her soul, used to fry them up with possum sausage and skiffles for breakfast. Talk about comfort food! DU
